structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Warrants for sums due pension fund.
law.text: It shall be the duty of such officer or officers of the said city as are designated by law, to draw warrants on the treasurer of said city, on request in writing by said board of trustees, payable to the treasurer of said board of trustees for all funds belonging to said pension fund as aforesaid.
